program.name: socat
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix5.2*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib"
ARGS="--disable-ip6 --disable-pty" ;; *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib"
ARGS="--disable-pty" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux11.11) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b,"
# getnameinfo and getaddrinfo are broken export ac_cv_func_getnameinfo=no export ac_cv_func_getaddrinfo=no ;; *-hpux11.00) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b,"
# getnameinfo and getaddrinfo are broken export ac_cv_func_getnameinfo=no export ac_cv_func_getaddrinfo=no
ARGS="--disable-ip6" ;; *-hpux11*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Ae -z +O2 +Ofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b,"
ARGS="--disable-ip6" ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
export sc_cv_termios_ispeed=no ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
export sc_cv_struct_cmsghdr=no ARGS="--disable-ip6" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+-I${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_NCURSES+-I${SB_VAR_NCURSES_INC} \ -I${SB_VAR_NCURSES_INC}/ncurses} \ ${SB_VAR_READLINE+-I${SB_VAR_READLINE_INC}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBWRAP+-I${SB_VAR_LIBWRAP_INC}}" \ LDFLAGS="${SB_VAR_NCURSES+-L${SB_VAR_NCURSES_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+-L${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_READLINE+-L${SB_VAR_READLINE_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBWRAP+-L${SB_VAR_LIBWRAP_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_NCURSES+${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_NCURSES_LIB}} \ ${SB_VAR_READLINE+${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_READLINE_LIB}} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" --mandir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man" \ --disable-fips ${ARGS+${ARGS}} --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

item.para: Apply patch for CVE-2012-0219 (http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2012-0219). Heap-based buffer overflow in the xioscan_readline function in xio-readline.c allows local users to execute arbitrary code via the READLINE address.
